page.title: 11CHICHESTER-A CICESTRIAN.
page.content: { Cicestrians,}as the citizens of Chichester are known, have seen many changes in their city in recent years. The city centre is pedestrianised, but it still remains a {Georgian city, dominated by the Cathedral spire and surrounded by ancient city walls. One man who has made his own special contribution to city life is { Mr. Leslie Evershed-Martin O.B.E.. He has lived in the city since 1932, has served on the city council and has been twice mayor. He is the founder of the{Chichester Festival Theatre}and the{Gala.}The Theatre, built by public subscription, has developed & thrived beyond his wildest dreams. The Gala he started in 1955 is now firmly fixed in the Chichester calendar. The 25th anniversary of the C.F.T. in 1986 stands tribute to this man's vision, that the impossible can be a reality.
